An extended ANFIS architecture and its learning properties for type-1 and interval type-2 models View all publications Current ResearchI am an interdisciplinary Computer Scientist working at the interface of Computer Science and the biological sciences. My research focusses on developing computational modelling and machine learning approaches to address hard, real-world biological problems. My interdisciplinary research reflects my deep interest in understanding how the biological and digital worlds work and interact. I am a member of the Intelligent Modelling and Analysis Group, and lead the Modelling Group in the Synthetic Biology Research Centre. Research expertise computational and mathematical modelling machine learning and artificial intelligence data analytics and visualisation software engineering Research areas computational biology synthetic biology systems biology systems medicine sustainable chemistry artificial life biologically-inspired computing artificial immune systems computer security and networking robotics CHEN C, TWYCROSS J and GARIBALDI J M, 2017.
